description: Developed STM32F4 Bare-metal drivers (GPIO, UART, SPI) using direct registers (No HAL).
Built a Proof-Of-Concept (POC) system to validate driver stability & hardware control logic.
Participated in technical presentation training & professional English workshops.
Developed hybrid CNN-BiLSTM Wake Word engine using Gated Fusion architecture.
Applied INT8 Quantization (293KB) achieving 7.47ms latency on Raspberry Pi 5.
Implemented Multi-aligned strategy (Start-Center-End) to eliminate false triggers (>95% F1-score).
